title: Pasquils iestes mixed with Mother Bunches merriments. Whereunto is added a bakers doozen of guiles. Very prettie and pleasant, to driue away the tediousnesse of a winters evening.
author: Pasquil.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed [by J. Windet] for Iohn Browne, and are to be sold at his shop in Saint Dunstones Church-yard, in Fleetestreete,
